skins.shipDescription: Dido-class light cruiser C Dido (HMS Dido.)
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Dido, name ship of the Dido-class. I served as an anti-aircraft cruiser in the Mediterranean during the war. By the way, I hope Sirius hasn't given you too much trouble...?
skins.acquisition: Good day, Master. I am the light cruiser Dido. I am in your service as a Royal Maid.
skins.login: Welcome home, Master. I am doing well, of course! Oh... m-my master is worried about me...
skins.details: Master, you won't abandon me, will you? Can you promise not to? Can I place my faith in you, Master? You are trustworthy, are you not? Ahh... I hope it wasn't a mistake to place my faith in you...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Master never abandoned anyone else before, correct? Or have you just not done so *yet*? In other words, Master cares more about them than me? Blast it... I can do better than that!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Have you any work for me to do? Please, it can be anything, no matter how unimportant. Yes, that is my purpose in life, as Master's loyal maid.
skins.secretaryIdle3: It is a pleasure to see you, beloved Master. Please allow me to serve and soothe you with all my mind and body. After all, I am your personal maid, and that is my duty.
skins.secretaryTouch: I did a good job, did I? Masterrrrr... Ah! It was nothing! J-j-j-just doing my job!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: M-Master... I am honored to receive your affections, but... this is most unorthodox...

skins.shipDescription: It is so audacious for a lowly maid to dress herself in such finery and stand at her master's side... Still, I will go to my master and... M-M-Master...?!
